name: Follow (lastinlineforusernames)
description: Having recently passed on to the other side, you find yourself locked in a strange house. It is evident that many others have been here before you, but the house's only other occupant appears to be a spooky little cat. Follow your newfound feline friend and solve the question that has been lingering on your mind since you arrived, how do I get out of this weird, old house?
